column2:
"Something's been bothering me lately. I guess you
could say it's a mid-life crisis."

"I feel like I don't even know who I am anymore
or what I want to do with the rest of my life."

"That's why I want you to show me things I normally
wouldn't see--exploits of other ARKS classes,
their abilities, their power--things like that."

"Maybe seeing these things will put my
life into focus and give me something to live for."

"Well, get to it, already. I'll be right here monitoring
you the whole time."
